newsitem.title: ZAMBIA: Trans Zambezi listed on Zambia exchange.
newsitem.headline: Trans Zambezi listed on Zambia exchange.

text.p: Diversified group Trans Zambezi Industries listed on the Lusaka Stock Exchange (LUSE) on Monday, an exchange official said.
"The LUSE is pleased to announce the admission of Trans Zambezi Industries to the official list of the exchange with effect from April 14, 1997, " the official said.
Trans Zambezi has interests and investments in sub-Saharan Africa including in the financial services and food distribution sectors.
The principle registered office of the company is in the British Virgin Islands where it was incorporated in 1993.
Its shares are listed on the Luxembourg Stock Exchange as a primary listing and also on the Zimbabwe Stock Exchange as a secondary listing.
The listing on the LUSE is a secondary listing via an introduction.
Tranz Zambezi will be listed with companies including Chilanga Cement, Zambia Sugar, Zambia Consolidated Copper Mines, Rothmans and Farmers House.
